sense.def:
Mime
je izražanje nečesa z gibanjem in gibi ali pripovedovanje zgodbe brez uporabe govora.

seg.quote: ...the re-telling of legends in mime and song.
He sought to improvise new mimes.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mimes something
, nekaj opiše ali izrazi z mimiko, ne z besedami.

seg.quote: We were told he was miming the god Shiva coming down from heaven.
